en.bdb: O Maulavee! You should please tell us! How do the worldly lusts and

verse.unicode: ਅਜ਼ ਖ਼ੁਦਾ ਗ਼ਾਫ਼ਿਲ ਸ਼ੁਦਨ ਐ ਮੌਲਵੀ ॥ ੩੯ ॥

en.bdb: pleasures matter if we become negligent of the memory of Waaheguru? (In fact, without Akaalpurakh, they have no value at all and are worthless) (39)
